v1.0, 2013-06-26 -- Feature-complete.
v1.1, 2013-08-15 -- Code clean-up.
v1.1.1, 2014-01-10 -- Code clean-up.

v1.3.0, 2014-11-06 -- Python 3.x support
v2.0.0, 2014-12-14 -- Rename project from "deep" to "deepest". Now on PyPI!
